description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Vertigo is a platform racing game that combines jumps and speed to deliver fast adrenalin pumping action in a game for everyone, regardless of skill level. It's all about getting yourself from start to finish as fast as possible. You do this by picking up as many powerups as you can because these will then "chain" themselves together to greatly increase your speed towards insane levels!
